text: Geophysical & Astrophysical Fluid Dynamics is a bimonthly peer-reviewed scientific journal covering applications of fluid dynamics in the fields of astrophysics and geophysics. It was established in 1970 as Geophysical Fluid Dynamics, obtaining its current name in 1977. It is published by Taylor & Francis and the editor-in-chief is Andrew Soward (Newcastle University). According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2017 impact factor of 1.417. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Geophysics journals Category:Astrophysics journals Category:Fluid dynamics journals Category:Publications established in 1970 Category:Bimonthly journals Category:Taylor & Francis academic journals Category:English-language journals
title: Geophysical & Astrophysical Fluid Dynamics
